content:
Dear brothers and sisters,

I am honored to be with you today and to speak to you about the great and glorious gospel of Jesus Christ. As a member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, I have the sacred responsibility to testify of the divinity of our Savior and to invite all to come unto Him.

In our world today, there are many who are searching for answers to life's most pressing questions. They may be looking for happiness, peace, and purpose in a world that is often filled with confusion, chaos, and despair. But my dear friends, I testify to you that the gospel of Jesus Christ provides the answers to all of life's questions. It provides the way to true and lasting happiness, peace, and purpose.

As we strive to follow our Savior, we may face trials and challenges that may seem insurmountable. We may experience pain, sorrow, and disappointment. But we can find comfort and strength in the promise of the Savior's atoning sacrifice. His infinite love and compassion are available to us always, and through His grace, we can be healed, forgiven, and made whole.

I invite you to reflect on the words of the prophet Isaiah, who wrote, "Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool" (Isaiah 1:18). This promise is available to each of us, no matter what our past may be. As we turn to the Savior and exercise faith in Him, we can receive the blessings of His atonement.

Brothers and sisters, I testify to you that our Heavenly Father loves us and desires our happiness. He has given us the gospel of Jesus Christ to guide us on our journey back to Him. I invite you to seek for a deeper understanding of the gospel and to apply its principles in your life. As you do so, you will experience the joy and peace that come from following our Savior.

In conclusion, I testify of the reality of our Savior and of His love for each of us. I invite you to come unto Him, to follow His teachings, and to receive the blessings that come from living the gospel of Jesus Christ. May we all strive to be true disciples of our Lord and Savior, I pray in the name of Jesus Christ, amen.
